channel.title: [317]CoreScape
channel.description:
[size=15pt]Released On 7/14/2013![/size] [size=15pt]Please send me feedback on what I can do to get you interested in playing, I'm really trying my best to give everyone who logs in a good first impression and a long lasting game to play.[/size]
[size=15pt][url=http://www.corescape.webs.com]www.corescape.webs.com[/url] [url=http://www.corescape.webs.com/forums]www.corescape.webs.com/forums[/url] [url=http://www.corescape.webs.com/webclient]www.corescape.webs.com/webclient[/url][/size]
[size=15pt]All skills trainable with loads of content Automatic Double XP Weekend! Clue Scrolls! Easter Event! All players treated equally Tons of monsters all around the world Every part of the world reachable with useful content No overpowered items No super staff with godlike abilities - everyone is the same Daily updates based on player feedback Full clipping! Reset Combat Skills! Automatic Voting Barrows On Hills! Great Donator Zone and Premium Zone! Different Homes and Different Skill Zone! Skillcape Masters Give their Own Capes! Great Owner! Lots of Stuff to Do on CoreScape! [/size]
[URL=http://s1264.photobucket.com/user/jesseinhd/media/home.png.html][IMG]http://i1264.photobucket.com/albums/jj489/jesseinhd/home.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1264.photobucket.com/user/jesseinhd/media/shop.png.html][IMG]http://i1264.photobucket.com/albums/jj489/jesseinhd/shop.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1264.photobucket.com/user/jesseinhd/media/skillcape.png.html][IMG]http://i1264.photobucket.com/albums/jj489/jesseinhd/skillcape.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1264.photobucket.com/user/jesseinhd/media/ksvw.png.html][IMG]http://i1264.photobucket.com/albums/jj489/jesseinhd/ksvw.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1264.photobucket.com/user/jesseinhd/media/assault.png.html][IMG]http://i1264.photobucket.com/albums/jj489/jesseinhd/assault.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1264.photobucket.com/user/jesseinhd/media/skilling.png.html][IMG]http://i1264.photobucket.com/albums/jj489/jesseinhd/skilling.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1264.photobucket.com/user/jesseinhd/media/cok.png.html][IMG]http://i1264.photobucket.com/albums/jj489/jesseinhd/cok.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1264.photobucket.com/user/jesseinhd/media/fish.png.html][IMG]http://i1264.photobucket.com/albums/jj489/jesseinhd/fish.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1264.photobucket.com/user/jesseinhd/media/miningandsmith.png.html][IMG]http://i1264.photobucket.com/albums/jj489/jesseinhd/miningandsmith.png[/img]

item.title: [317]CoreScape
item.dc:creator: @codwalkers codwalkers
item.description:
@codwalkers wrote:

Lined up shops, barrows on the hills that drop every kill, very odd looking woodcutting section. It looks sloppy, too be fair

Read full topic

item.description:

Doesn’t look like anything special, but Im always looking for a server to play, Ill come check it out

item.title: [317]CoreScape

item.description:
@jessenhd wrote:

[size=15pt]Released On 7/14/2013![/size]
[size=15pt]Please send me feedback on what I can do to get you interested in playing, I’m really trying my best to give everyone who logs in a good first impression and a long lasting game to play.[/size]

[size=15pt]www.corescape.webs.com
www.corescape.webs.com/forums
www.corescape.webs.com/webclient[/size]

[size=15pt]All skills trainable with loads of content
Automatic Double XP Weekend!
Clue Scrolls!
Easter Event!
All players treated equally
Tons of monsters all around the world
Every part of the world reachable with useful content
No overpowered items
No super staff with godlike abilities - everyone is the same
Daily updates based on player feedback
Full clipping!
Reset Combat Skills!
Automatic Voting
Barrows On Hills!
Great Donator Zone and Premium Zone!
Different Homes and Different Skill Zone!
Skillcape Masters Give their Own Capes!
Great Owner!
Lots of Stuff to Do on CoreScape!
[/size]
